subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Levi Leipheimer of the United States, preparing for the Tour de France, won the Dauphiné Libéré yesterday. Christophe Moreau of France was second in the event, a warm-up for the Tour, 1 minute 48 seconds back, and Bernard Kohl of Germany was third.
